website_summaries.verdict: This option has a pleasingly simple design and makes coffee quickly, but its small size may disappoint those who like to drink a lot of iced coffee.
pros: Makes undiluted iced coffee in 60 sec
Simple premise: just freeze it and pour coffee into it
Deep lid makes for easy pouring
Can also be used for tea, wine, and other beverages
cons: Very small, so you can't make much at one time, and you must refreeze it between servings
Some say that this option spills easily
Initial freeze takes up to 12 hours

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a daily iced coffee drinker!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid (i.e. daily) iced coffee drinker, but I have been extremely hesitant to make my own iced coffee at home because I didn’t want the bitter flavor from two-day old coffee or the watered-down nature of just adding ice to coffee. Thanks to the HyperChiller, I have now found a solution!!! The HyperChilller worked like a CHARM today!!! I was able to create my own iced coffee directly from my coffee maker in the comfort of my own home. I guarantee this item will be used frequently! Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the first version, fell in love, but ended up having something happen with the threading. Customer service immediately took care of me!! I love a company that stands by their product. So when I found out about version 2, I grabbed it. It has a slightly deeper pouring well, and the threading feels sturdier. I cannot stand watered down iced coffee, and cold brew never seems to taste strong enough. I use a French press and the HyperChiller every morning, perfect cup of iced coffee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Stoecker

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and great product. Ended up buying two more as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. Good instructions, in real English. Once you have it together and frozen, it becomes a no brainer. Just brew right into the chiller and swirl. Cooled my coffee in 10 seconds with no dilution. Surprised at how easy it is to clean. No taking apart, just pour in clean water to rinse and reuse. Liked it so much bought two more as gifts for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Uglider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean-makes great undiluted iced tea
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as described to chill whatever beverage you want without diluting it by pouring over ice. I love iced tea but one of my biggest beefs is either having to chill it by diluting it or waiting it out in the fridge for hours. I'm the only iced tea drinker in my family so making an entire pitcher doesn't make sense when I only want a glass occasionally. With the Hyperchiller V2, problem happily solved. It lives in my freezer until needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves cold coffee but doesn’t like the process or taste of trying to cool it the traditional way. Instead, he would go buy a cold coffee, so when I saw this I got it for him as a gift. He called me the other day just to tell me how much he loves this chiller. He says it works perfectly to give him instantly cold coffee. All he has to do is pour his fresh brewed coffee into the chiller, and it is immediately turned into ready-to-drink cold coffee. He told me I really scored with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great for quickly chilling drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for coffee, but I have ended up using it to chill alcoholic beverages, and it was super convenient and worked great! I have only used it for coffee once, and it worked well. I only had to do the set up once, and nothing has leaked, so I just let it thaw between uses and rinse it out well before putting it back in the freezer. After reading so many other reviews, I was a little cautious, but so far, I have been pleased! It also sounds like the sellers are pretty responsive, so that always makes me feel better about a purchase!
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cools black coffee to drinkable temp quickly
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for father's day and it turned out better than expected! My dad likes drip coffee but it's too hot to drink it black right away, so he used to let it cool in his mug on the way to work but that takes too long. Now he keeps this in the freezer, pours the coffee from the pot into this and then immediately pours it into his mug, and it's the perfect temperature. Gives this thing a quick rinse and back in the freezer for tomorrow. Simple but it works and saves valuable time in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it cracked and leaked water everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my iced coffee loving wife. It worked great for about two weeks then, without warning, it cracked while being filled with coffee and all of the water between the layers drained out all over the counter. Very disappointed. I read other reviews that had this same problem, but just figured they got a defective one or it had been dropped at some point. Ours was filled to the line with water as directed by the manufacturers instructions and has never been dropped. It just failed. I would not recommend this product until the manufacturer can assure this issue has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on side day after return window closed!
customer_reviews.text: Side split open. Is useless now and did it the day after return window closed. Loved the product till this happened. Update: Customer service was great they sent a new one after the first one cracked...... Then again a few months later... the new one cracked in the same place as the previous one. No other use other than once a day to cool coffee.. It works great until splits down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Zathan Bark

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!!!  Has given me ice coffee back!!!
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE***. Do not waste your $! I got one and loved it for 2-3 months. Well outer shell snapped open and leaks water everywhere when it’s defrosting or being used. So I emailed seller. They were kind enough to quickly replace. Well it happened again with my first use of the new one. So just save your money and find another option. Here’s the answer to no longer having watered down ice coffee!!! Love this device!
customer_reviews.author: J. W. S.

customer_reviews.title: would be great if it was more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It worked great....until the outside cracked. I just crossed over the 90 day return window and a large crack has formed up the side of the outer plastic cup. I used it a lot for coffee, but I never dropped and didn't overfill it so I assume it was from constant temperature change. I wouldn't buy it again or recommend it with the way its made, and the limited warranty. Its not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matkins

customer_reviews.title: If Jack Frost dipped his pinkie in your coffee...
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is unbelievably fast as long as you follow the directions (which we learned because husband did not). You just need to keep it upright in the freezer to ensure the water is appropriately and evenly distributed when it becomes the ice core. It's a little bulky, but fits easily in a Keurig-type coffee maker. No more melted ice in my coffee and no more trying to remember to make it the night before!
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked again
customer_reviews.text: Are use my iced coffee maker almost every day. This is now the third one I’ve had that has cracked. I’m hoping that the manufacturer which is out to be replaces the unit as it’s less than a year old. I love the system, but I don’t understand why it keeps on cracking I am adding the correct amount of water to the two different chambers.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in August 2018 and initially loved it. It was so nice to finally make iced coffee without melted ice cubes or having to make it the night before. I used it until it became cold enough for hot coffee again. I finally decided to break it out again a couple weeks ago when it got warm out, and the plastic cracked as soon as the coffee brewed into it (see picture). I'm really disappointed that this product didn't even last a year before breaking (including 6 months where it wasn't used at all).
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the HyperChiller! I was a bit skeptical about the claims that it chills your coffee in 1-2 minutes, but it seriously works. It's easy to use--just freeze it, pour your coffee in, and wait 2 minutes (or less time if you swirl the coffee around while it's in the HyperChiller). It doesn't fit under my Keurig (I have a small one; I think it would fit if you have a larger Keurig), but it's easy enough to pour the coffee into the HyperChiller from another mug. I definitely recommend this product if you're looking for an easy way to make iced coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Cooler cracked after about a month of normal use
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this chiller given all of the positive reviews. I generally used it to chill my coffee in the morning and the cooler did work pretty well for about a month. Then yesterday, I was just cooling some filtered water and left it for about 10 minutes. When I came back, the cooler was cracked and leaking water. There also doesn't seem to reach out to the manufacturer for warranty questions or replacements. I would look elsewhere as this product is not a quality build.
customer_reviews.author: johnny_b_good

customer_reviews.title: Great for not watering down drinks
customer_reviews.text: I can now have iced coffee at home without the ice watering down the coffee or having to make the coffee the night before. I keep it in the freezer. It is great for chilled wine also. Easy to clean, just run water through the top to rinse it out and back in the freezer it goes. I am buying another so I have an extra for when friends visit. To clean thoroughly after a few uses, just take the chambers apart and wash with soapy water. So simple to use and take care of. A bit expensive for what it is, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber DiGrazia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in love with the Hyperchiller!!!! I live in South Texas.. it’s HOT and that makes it hard to enjoy my coffee in the morning. This little thing gives you iced coffee without watering it down!! There is 3 compartments- outer most compartment is where you put in water to freeze, middle is where the coffee is poured and then inner most compartment is more ice. When you’re ready for your coffee you pour it directly into the lid which goes into the center compartment. You can let it sit or swirl it around. And WHALAHH!!!! It’s honestly the coolest thing!! ***I’m hoping they come out with a BIG size!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Leitko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for quickly cooling Beverages
customer_reviews.text: This chiller is so convenient! I am terri At remembering to fill the ice tray and I’m not too fond of watering down my beverages... this chiller is so easy! I just filled it up per the instructions and keep it in my freezer. I use it daily for coffee, water, and wine! I just rinse thoroughly with each use and wash once a week. Don’t even have to open it to rinse it. The stainless steel inside makes for easy clean up. Loved it so much I bought a second 😅
customer_reviews.author: Belaura Griego

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broke! Can no longer use it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the hyper chiller. I had the earlier version and it lasted forever. I bought the updated one (this one) in March because it’s easier to pour from than the old one. BUT, it cracked. The top fell in. I added pictures to show what I mean. I’m terribly disappointed in the quality of this version. Because of the fact that the plastic broke 6 months after purchasing it, I’m only giving it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tight tolerence from package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother who is turning into a huge Iced coffee addict. When we were opening it up at the table, after reading the instructions I tried to undo the twist and found it surprisingly difficult. There are 3 pieces you have to unscrew in order to get to the inner chamber that needs to be filled with water then frozen. I was afraid I would do some irreversible damage to the product by turning too hard but it eventually gave way with one person holding and another twisting. I was unable to unscrew this by myself; that's extremely tight for a never opened product. Great design and Idea but crazy difficult to get going.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Uken

customer_reviews.title: Hot beverage still washes over plastic
customer_reviews.text: Beware that, though the beverage-containing portion is made of steel, the lid/top is plastic -- and your hot beverage is poured over various plastic portions before it reaches the steel (and back out again as you drink/decant) thus exposing the liquid to plastic (and all that entails). If you're trying to avoid consuming the leachate of heated plastics, this is not the cooler for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-Fu

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of crap after just 1 use the top popped off and can’t even get it to screw on. There’s a hole on top and if it’s melted at Least the slightest it will drop all over the place. You have to melt it to clean it and it’s too small for a decent size cup of coffee
customer_reviews.author: christopher j callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the half dozen times it was used. Then it was cracked upon removal from the freezer. Of course it was just past the return deadline. Nice concept, poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Aal

customer_reviews.title: Great - Until it Cracked
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions exactly as specified in the manual with not overfilling either chamber for freezing. In just 2 weeks of use, the outer plastic chamber cracked in the freezer! (See photo - it cracked along a weak spot next to the product emblem.) I tried emailing the company at the email address listed in the instruction manual and it bounced. The outer chamber really should be made of something other than plastic or a sturdier grade!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical that putting my hot coffee in this system for only 3 minutes would turn it into ice coffee, but it really does work! Just add some ice cubes into your cup after you've poured it and you never would have known. I use it every morning. I just wish I could use it multiple times before it re-freezes for another use, but it's stainless steel, ice and hot coffee... of course it's going to melt a bit. Not a big deal. I am very satisfied with my purchase and I'd recommend it to anyone who loves Ice Coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Hankhemoth

customer_reviews.title: Is 12.5 OZ!
customer_reviews.text: I use this three times a day every day, I've had it for a couple months now and love it. It is a little pricey but they own the patent so there is no other option... if you like iced coffee without it being watered down this is a must have I originally gave this product 2 stars. Had to come back and change it, I thought the capacity was wrong, it turns out it was my coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hooker

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS RIGHT NOW
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once, so there’s a possibility of an updated review if it breaks or something BUT OH MY GOSH. I am ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED. I find it so hard to make a good iced coffee at home without it taking forever, being super bitter or super watered down but this thing is a little miracle. FRESH tasting iced coffee in under 2 minutes at home. Everyone needs this.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo47

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love cold beverages, even if it's the dead of winter. I like my coffee cold, my wine cold, everything cold!!! I was a little hesitant when I read other reviews about cracking issues when something super hot was poured in, but I have used mine a TON and it is still standing strong. I've poured SUPER SUPER hot coffee in it too, and it was fine. It really does make stuff super insanely cold and take mega hot coffee and turn it super cold in a couple of minutes. I love it and will keep using it!!! Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy with the frozen ice and drink liquid inside but does chill liquids well
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel is easy to clean and the cup-in-a-cup design works well to chill drinks. However the lid is made of plastic that becomes very brittle when cold. Mine was near the front of the freezer and fell out when I opened the door shattering the lid rendering the product unusable. A suggestion would be for them to make the lid out of a more pliable plastic so it won't shatter on impact.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Nuvi User

customer_reviews.title: It may not last as long as you’d like.
customer_reviews.text: First cracked and now won’t retain the water and was obviously outside the warranty date. Second one, the top lid won’t tighten correctly and when it freezes, it loosens up causing the water inside to pour out or into what ever drink you’re filling. When it was working, it was incredible, as it says, but I’ve had to Epoxy and FlexSeal the first one a few times and always make sure to tighten the second before I start pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cercone

customer_reviews.title: I’m astounded!
customer_reviews.text: —Feel free to ask me any questions about my review!— Truly, I thought this was a gimmick. Spoiler: it’s not. It really works. And it doesn’t make my coffee taste bitter like putting it in the fridge or freezer does. I am so impressed! I hope my description was of use to you! —Follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram for more amazing Amazon finds!—
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Its good but doesn't work well with reality hot liquids
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I like the product. It does a good of chilling liquid. The problem is it is not good with really hot liquids like coffee. It melts the ice of the inner cylinder and causes water to get into my coffee. So if you are looking to cool down a room temperature liquid then its great. Don't by this if you are looking to cook down coffee quicker though because it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a month
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this product I loved it - it works exactly as advertised, cooling my coffee straight out of the Keurig. However, after about a month of daily use, the outer container cracked. Luckily I was still within the return window. I’m hoping this was just a fluke because otherwise I loved the product. Just may need better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: ems25

customer_reviews.title: AHHHHMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I got it for my husband to use for his beer and I don’t think he’s used it once. But the rest of the family has!! Juice, tea, wine... you name it, we’ve tried it and it is AHHH-MAZING! We had friends over for dinner and I forgot to put my wine in the fridge - no worries! My girlfriend was so impressed she wanted one, too!
customer_reviews.author: ChristalynD

customer_reviews.title: I wish we still had this
customer_reviews.text: This was great while we had it, pretty easy to use, instructions were clear but don't let it fall out of your freezer. It cracked from a 4 foot drop but that's to be expected. I would buy it again but I'm too lazy.
customer_reviews.author: KiyoshiTheKidd

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find some thing for cold brew coffee for a long time and I saw this on Amazon. I was very skeptical but I bought it anyway based on the reviews that said it worked great. I used it for the first time today and was very surprised how well it worked. It was very easy to use, easy to clean, and the cold brew coffee was great. I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend it for those who like cold brew coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ihde

customer_reviews.title: Best investment in myself in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond happy about this. I love coffee but since I live in Arizona and it's well over 100° for the past several months I don't want hot coffee, nor do I want diluted coffee because the ice melted. Just freeze the container and pour your fresh brew in here for 60 seconds. It's so great!! I can enjoy my daily cup again!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, after the initial freezing period you can have undiluted iced coffee in seconds. However, after less than a month of ownership, the lid is slipping and won't screw tight. This makes for water spilling out anytime I try to pour, rendering the device pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: ethan819

customer_reviews.title: You get iced coffee in 2 minutes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. They like it a lot and have put it to good use in the week they have owned it. I debated between getting a iced coffee brewer and this instant chiller. I chose this because when you want an iced coffee.... well you want it NOW! This fits the bill. It also goes in the freezer so it takes up no precious fridge space.
customer_reviews.author: colleen m

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get your hopes up
customer_reviews.text: After 4 uses the bottom pretty much exploded in the freezer. I’m giving it two stars because for the 4 times prior it worked well enough and was pretty straight forward. Super disappointed that it actually cracked like that. Would not recommend since there are other products that seem to work better without tearing apart.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: New design works better.
customer_reviews.text: This new ice chiller version works great. They have improved on the lid so when you pour, it flows better and there is only one air hole at the back so you don’t have to worry about water dripping from it as you tip the chiller. My first chiller lid cracked so I debated if I wanted a new one because of the flaws I stated. I am glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I prefer iced coffee over hot so this item was a god send. Straight from the keurig into the hyper chiller let it sit or swirl it for 1 minute and its below room temperature. You still have to add the ice because its not magic. Ice starts to melt on the inside chambers after 2 coffees then you have to refreeze it. As soon as these are back in stock i will be buying a 2nd for my office coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan DeCaprio

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in less than 2 months with minimal use!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 months and have used it at the most 6 times and it cracked!!!! I would not recommend this product as I read others have had the same issue but was hopeful it would not happen to mine.
customer_reviews.author: BWR

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for at home iced coffee
customer_reviews.text: I drink coffee everyday and sometimes even twice a day and was spending so much money on it. I have an older Keurig, but I love iced coffee so I was looking for something that would chill down my coffee instantly. This was definitely the product. It takes about 1-3 minutes to cool it to the temperature I want, but while I wait for that I get my cup ready and clean out my reusable pods and Keurig in the meantime. SO, I don't even notice the wait. I HIGHLY recommend this product for anyone who spends way to much money going to Starbucks for iced coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great, turns hot coffee almost cold
customer_reviews.text: It sounded like an awesome present with a sound design. The lid (where you pour hot coffee onto) is plastic, and should be stainless or ceramic because plastic can leach over time. Better to let coffee sit a minute before pouring. You have to pour slowly into the shallow plastic lid or it spills over. I froze the filled center core and outer container per instructions. After 2 minutes, the coffee was almost cold. Cool idea though.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted (4 months)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, used it daily for over four months, made the perfect iced coffee. I made certain to never overfill the water in the canisters each time I cleaned it. I poured some fresh coffee into the hyper chiller one morning and noticed a pool of water under the chiller, the entire side cracked open and water leaked all over my counter. Needless to say, I am extremely disappointed. Looking for alternatives as the wife needs her iced coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chills well but has a crack after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my favorite purchases for chilling coffee and wine. HOWEVER we have only had it 2 months and there is already a crack in the side that it causing it to leak. I am trying to figure out how to contact the store to see if it is under some kind of warranty as my hope is they will replace it since it’s barely 2 months used. Other than that one issue it’s be great over all.
customer_reviews.author: MTS79

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly hesitant that it would work properly or even as fast as it did. I have used it a few times now and it his honestly amazing! I put hot freshly brewed coffe in the chiller and in two minutes it was cold like an iced coffee! I don't like drinking my coffee hot, which is the main reason I purchased this product. I just didn't think it would work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Borgen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, if it didn’t crack on its own
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product a much higher review had the unit not cracked on its own. You brew coffee into the unit, wait about 3 minutes and pour into a cup to enjoy chilled coffee. Rinse with water and place back in freezer. Easy! It works great but a product shouldn’t just crack like this. It was never dropped and always handled with care. Not ok :(
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to me, so I wasn't sure what to expect from it. I've used it countless times to chill room temperature water (and occasionally coffee) and it works like a charm every time! The biggest down side is the amount of liquid it can chill at once - it doesn't hold an entire water bottle, so I end up doing as much will fit, then pour it back into the water bottle, then do it again. This works better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: C1

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t exactly what I expected but it was my fault for not fully reading the description. It’s not as “smart” as I was thinking, but supposedly it works really well. I’m not sure if I’ll end up using it, but it might be something worth giving as a gift to somebody.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Sadly I will be returning this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I thought it was a great idea and wanted to try it. When it came in the mail the outside box was all ripped up. The top was almost completely coming off. As for the actual product we got the outer part off but we could not get the middle part to unscrew. Everyone in the house tried to unscrew it. It would not come off. It is very difficult. So therefore we could not even try and use it. Not to mention the threading of the outside part was not very easy to put back together as well. It wouldn’t screw back on correctly or sit right.
customer_reviews.author: The Dunn’s

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice cold coffee in a minute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget! Makes my coffee cold in 1 minute! I put it in the freezer overnight and just use my Keurig for a cup of cold coffee. You do need to add some ice to your glass, but no meltiness or luke warm coffee happens. The coffee is COLD! It's great, good quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rubin

customer_reviews.title: When the ice melts, prepare for it to leak into your coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I got one and was excited to use it and when I finally poured, I noticed liquid never stopped dripping. I realized it was water coming from the lid! I thought, Did I not tighten this enough? Because I know I did. Well I emptied the ice added water and tightened again and was sure to cover both air holes at the top. Sure enough it leaks at the seal. I ordered another hoping the first was just a defective unit and tried it too and same thing. Am I using this wrong? Is there a rubber gasket missing? Am I the only one to experience melted faucet ice water dribble in their coffee?
customer_reviews.author: EMINENT 1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect until it cracked!
customer_reviews.text: Was just thinking the other day I should come and write a rave review about this thing, specifically how much they improved it from the first version which I also owned. And then this morning I went to pour my coffee out of the hyperchiller and there was water all over the counter. Turned out there was a hairline crack right up the side, leaking out water. Bummer! I did use it a lot - at least once per day, but I would expect it to last longer than 4.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really does what it says! I like drinking iced coffee but I don't like making it at home since ice dilutes the flavor. The HyperChiller is so simple and does the job. The only improvements I would make is have some sort of see-through portion so you can see the coffee level as you pour. Also, maybe replace the plastic outer portion with stainless steel, except for a plastic/rubber grip area where you can hold the chiller. Replacing the plastic with stainless steel could make the Chiller more durable and also cool the coffee even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Unscrews When In Freezer
customer_reviews.text: The first few times we used this product it worked as intended but then the larger portion of the canister started popping off in the freezer and wouldn't cap back on until after it melted again. The company was nice enough to send us a new one but the same thing happened the second time we used the new one. As much as I want this product to work, it's hard to imagine a third one actually working. Super bummed as I heard good things about this product.
